casebody.data:
99-0629 (La. 4/23/99)

Vicki BOWMAN, et al. v. Marguerite PICOU, M.D. No. 99-C-0629. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Bowman, Vicki; Bowman, Robert; — Plaintiff(s); Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review; Parish of Natchitoches 10th Judicial District Court Div. “B” Number 68,594; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, Number CA98-0969

Denied.

CALOGERO, C. J. not on panel. LEMMON, J. would grant the writ.
